name: MICHIGAN CREDIT UNION LEAGUE
sampleDescriptions: MCUL opposes attempts to subject the NCUA to the annual appropriations process and supported efforts to keep language off the Omnibus Appropriations bill (H.R. 1625) that would have put the NCUA in th

MCUL supports common-sense regulatory reform for community based financial institutions, like credit unions who were not responsible for the financial collapse but are subject to one size fits all reg
MCUL continues to educate Congress on the benefits of the credit union not-for-profit tax status and calls on Congress to reject future attempts to alter the tax status.
